item.title: Project 2: Software Engineer Salary Estimator Tool
Project 1: Penn State Post-Grad Salary Analysis
item.description: Due to COVID-19, many college graduates across the United States have unfortunately experienced a hard time searching for Full-Time opportunities in the job market. This analysis was done with the vision of providing graduates of The Pennsylvania State University Donald P. Bellisario College of Communications an up to date analysis of what locations are currently offering the most jobs and best salaries for each position. With this analysis, graduates and rising seniors can obtain an idealistic view of what each position has an average salary of across the country in various locations which can be useful when in negotiations of salaries.
